text: Abramovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Sarginsky Selsoviet of Krasnooktyabrsky District, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia. The population was 116 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located on the right bank of the Pyana River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
title: Abramovo, Krasnooktyabrsky District, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
